name: August Sky
blurb: As the Amazon burns for the seventeenth day, a nurse in Sao Paulo finds herself drawn to a Neo-Pentecostal church.

name: ReMoved
blurb: A 10-year-old girl navigates her way through the foster care system, after being removed from her home and separated from her younger brother.

name: Play It Safe
blurb: Coaxed into playing a racial typecast in a fellow student's play, Jonathan is faced to either challenge prejudice, or play it safe.

name: Brenda
blurb: The last day of a heroin addicts life as seen through the eyes of her seven year old daughter.
